about_the_game:
Celebrate the season and get into the holiday spirit with these festive warm sweaters and weapon skins. This bundle includes:
- Holiday Sweater Noël
- Holiday Sweater Yuletide
- Claus weapon skin
- Ginger weapon skin
- Lusekofte weapon skin
- Noël weapon skin
- Snowdrop weapon skin
detailed_description:
Celebrate the season and get into the holiday spirit with these festive warm sweaters and weapon skins. This bundle includes:
- Holiday Sweater Noël
- Holiday Sweater Yuletide
- Claus weapon skin
- Ginger weapon skin
- Lusekofte weapon skin
- Noël weapon skin
- Snowdrop weapon skin
